text.p: True or False: If a matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is not square, it cannot be invertible.
True or False: If a matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is square, it must be invertible.

solution.font: Watch the last video again! Non-square matrices cannot be invertible, but not every square matrix is invertible. For instance, a square matrix of all zeros is not invertible.
